import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete site view"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/views/for-sites/{viewId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a saved site view so it no longer appears in site view lists or selectors. Use this when a view is obsolete or duplicated.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/views/for-sites](/docs/api/views/list-site-views) to list site views and extract `Items[].ViewId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List site views: [GET /api/v1.0/views/for-sites](/docs/api/views/list-site-views) -&gt; choose a view to remove.
2. (Optional) Backup: [GET /api/v1.0/views/for-sites/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/views/get-site-view) to capture the definition.
3. Delete the view: [DELETE /api/v1.0/views/for-sites/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/views/delete-site-view).

**Minimal Required Fields**: `viewId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"viewId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Identifier of the site view to delete.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Site view deleted successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response returned after successfully deleting a resource. >
